issue.title: [C++] Restore apache-arrow Homebrew recipe and define process for maintaining and updating for releases
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4300](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4300). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As far as I know, the Apache Arrow community has not been maintaining

https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/blob/9a4c569e7c6e63cb1171c2b2f209de2108a39eb7/Formula/apache-arrow.rb

It was just dropped from Homebrew for lack of maintenance. Some installation targets may depend on Arrow from Homebrew, so we should include updating Homebrew in our release management process
